Worldwide communication: Instantly learning any language would allow people to communicate with others from different countries and cultures more effectively. This could lead to better international relationships and a greater understanding of different ways of life.
Career opportunities: Being able to speak multiple languages would open up a wide range of career opportunities, from working as a translator to being a global ambassador for a company.
Travel: Instantly learning a language would make traveling to foreign countries much easier, as you would be able to understand and communicate with locals more effectively.

Education: Learning a new language would be a great way to challenge yourself and improve your cognitive abilities. It would also allow you to learn more about the culture and history of the language you are learning.
Mental health: Learning a new language has been shown to improve mental health by boosting memory and cognitive function. It would also provide a sense of accomplishment and personal growth.
